name: King's Garden
description:
King's Garden is a game where you play as gardener, tasked with tending the Royal Blue Flowers, a rare and expensive species of flower that die within a minute of not watering (Yes, really).

If you want to keep your job, you'll have to frantically run around the garden and tend to each of the five Royal Blues before they wither away, are you up to task?

Controls:

-WASD to move (surprisingly)

-SPACE to jump (also surprisingly)

-E to equip and unequip your canister

-ENTER to interact with objects

-LEFT CLICK to use your water canister

-RIGHT CLICK to refill your water canister
